metadata.description: Official Superconductor plugin marketplace for Claude Code and other agents.

plugins.name: Gemini
plugins.description: Provides several skills powered by Google Gemini: video-understanding (supporting local files and YouTube links), audio-understanding (supporting local files and YouTube links), image-generation (using Nano Banana Pro), video-generation (using Veo 3.1), and gemini-consultation (to get a second opinion from another frontier AI).
